comment.body: Are all the the torrents without trackers? I seem to be having trouble finding peers...
Same if you run out: andrewm@zeroid.bit
@Dios: You can use Javascript on a Zite: http://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/faq/#does-zeronet-only-support-html-css-websites
@Alek: https://qtox.github.io/ is nice if it's communication based :)
@Shellbound: I don't think matrix has end-to-end encryption yet?

Sure, but you'd need an ARM build of Zeronet first. Plus you'd need some OS, even if it's a lightweight one. Problem with modern phones is the driver hell required to get the hardware working. Plus, for the price of a phone you may as well get a $25 RaspberryPi that already has a full blown linux distro loaded onto it, and are designed to run forever.
@ZAlex: Good point, so it should work wherever there's a python binary installed.
How long have you waited? You need to download the blockchain if this is your first time trying it. Took me about 2 hrs first time.
@tkarita: Nope, working fine all day, even now.
